table.title: Tenant List
table.description: View and manage all registered tenants

delete.question: Are you sure you want to delete Tenant {{ id }}?

help.databaseVendor: Select the database vendor for this tenant
help.databaseVersion: Select the database version (showing versions from last 3 years)
help.databaseProvisioningMode: Choose whether to create a new database or use an existing one
help.databaseHost: Database server hostname or IP address
help.databasePort: Database server port (default shown based on vendor)
help.uploadDriver: Upload JDBC or R2DBC driver JAR file for the selected vendor and version
help.driverClassName: Full class name of the driver (e.g., com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver)
help.selectDriver: Select an uploaded driver or upload a new one above
help.tenantKey: Unique identifier for the tenant (lowercase letters and numbers only)
help.subdomain: Auto-generated subdomain based on tenant key
help.platform: Select the platform type for this tenant
help.defaultRoles: Default roles created in the realm
help.name: Enter the display name for the tenant
help.platformAndDatabase: Configure platform type and database vendor settings
help.status: Set the active status for this tenant
